metadata.name: Potential Download/Upload Activity Using Type Command
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "type" command to download/upload data from WebDAV server

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' > \\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type \\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' > '))))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "type" command to download/upload data from WebDAV server
